name: TARRACO
description:
Clumsy fighters giving their lifes for Glory, and other reasons...

    Get ready to live this hilarious adventure alognside Taco!

    Survive in the ruthless arena agaist oppresive hordes or play with your friends in varios game modes, teaming up or competing with them to fight for the pricess love 

    Please note that Tarraco is not finished yet, we are still working on it's developement

    To play LOCAL multiplayer (UP TO 4 PLAYERS), you only need two or more controllers and press your A (xBox) button, if you have any doubt or recommendation, please tell us about it :D
